meanings.sent1: The laundry felt overdried and stiff after being left in the dryer too long.
meanings.sent2: The plant looked overdried and wilted from being in the sun all day.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so overdried that it crumbled like sand when touched.
meanings.sent4: Her overdried hair resembled straw blowing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The overdried leaves crackled underfoot as she walked through the forest.

meanings.sent1: The overdried fruit was tough and unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The overdried paint on the wall was starting to peel.
meanings.sent3: The overdried sponge soaked up water like a thirsty desert.
meanings.sent4: His overdried lips were chapped and sore from the harsh wind.
meanings.sent5: The overdried meat crumbled to dust at the slightest touch.

meanings.sent1: The overdried towel felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The overdried grass crunched under their feet as they walked.
meanings.sent3: The overdried pasta stuck together in a clump when cooked.
meanings.sent4: Her overdried hands were cracked and sore from the cold weather.
meanings.sent5: The overdried flowers lost their vibrant colors and turned dull.
